resources.string: Hub cannot be forgotten, while it is connected.
Issuing remote control commands might cause damage to your devices. You are using this app at your own risk. This app is provided without any warranties.

This app is provided to you using the MIT license.

This app as well as its source code of this app is shared with you under the MIT license. The license as well as the source code of this app is available at https://github.com/rrayst/tobis-bleremote . It is copyright ©2019 Tobias Polley.
